TopicTitle: Beautiful early morning Ares 1 with Orion capsule launch

Articles.Content:
I built this Ares 1 and Orion capsule as part of the pack for 'The Dunatian' a stock playable save file based on 'The Martian' book/film. I discovered a small error and went back to update it. I had always hated that it was not the right color stock, so while I was working on it I gave it a paint job and some decals. She is such a beauty I made a little video of her launching and deploying Orion. Hope you enjoy.

Note: Sorry if you don't hear music, still playing with it
